about_the_game:
Those boards don't work on water! Outatime is a futuristic multiplayer hoverboard racing game. Lean-to-move system designed from the ground up for VR. Race against the clock and other hoverboarders in a futuristic setting. Will you claim victory, complete the race, or be out of time?...

Outatime is currently early in development and has a limited amount of content. More levels and features are planned but we are taking on community feedback. If you have any suggestions, feel free to join or Disord and share your ideas!

Outatime supports LIV mixed reality capture and is cross-play compatible with the standalone Quest version available on AppLab.

name: Outatime

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: 1x USB 2.0 or newer, HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
